text: Saleh Al-Saqri () (born 1979) is a Saudi Arabian football (soccer) player who currently plays as a defender for Al Ittihad. Al-Saqri played for Saudi Arabia at the 1999 FIFA World Youth Championship in Nigeria. ==References== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Saudi Arabia international footballers Category:2000 AFC Asian Cup players Category:Al-Tai FC players Category:Ittihad FC players Category:Ettifaq FC players Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Association football defenders
title: Saleh Al-Saqri
